name: DOOT (lafossealfonso)
description:
DOOT is a music-inspired DOOM game. Roam through hell as you expel your enemies with your trumpet, or blast them with your trombone. Maraca grenades and Cymbals included for your entertainment. Controls are in a text file inside .zip file.

DOOT was made in a 2-day student game jam by Aiden Storer, Tarren Boswell, Thomas Tidy, Jago LeDeunff and Alfonso Lafosse.
